Pre-Game Insights: The Indian team has quickly adapted to their new captain and coach and registered two back-to-back wins.
The Lankan batting remains an issue, especially with their middle-order which has failed to score quick runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Men in Blue clinched the series after winning the rain-affected second game.
The Lankans have showcased some positive intent and even managed to produce some incredible moments but failed to register a win.
Others: The T20I series between Sri Lanka and India concludes with the third fixture at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium.
The Indian batting has looked good throughout the series, especially with the top order in incredible form.
